name: 鄭麗玲
objective:
現代人對圖像與影像十分熟悉，對世界各地的歷史卻可能很陌生。本課程將藉由圖像與影像的引領，使修課者瞭解世界各地不同的歷史發展、生活樣貌與思考模式。活潑而多面向的思考與多元價值，是創意之能源源不絕的根本，藉由影像呈現出不同文化、思考與生活方式，協助學生跳脫單一思考與僵化的價值觀。另一方面，學習相關歷史，將可培養學生日後利用本地素材進行相關圖像創作的基礎知識，激發各式文化創作的創意。
This course will help students learn about the historical development, lifestyles, and patterns of thought in different cultures of the world with the aid of visual images in photos or films, static or animated. Powerful, vigorous and multidimensional thinking is definitely the key to the endless source of creativity. The use of images can facilitate the cultivation of such thinking ability by bringing up the multiple phases of world cultures, lifestyles and ways of thinking, thereby freeing students from one-dimensional and narrow-minded viewpoint. Once they gain a comprehensive understanding and insights of world history, hopefully they will be actively inspired to create brilliant works of visual art based on local materials in Taiwan.
